title: ISic000133. I.Sicily inscription 000133
body:
Facsimile Images

1.A..UNTI.[---]
2BROCC.[.---]
3[.]OCUSPU.LICD[....]
4EXD.INFR[..---]
5INAGROPXX[---]

Apparatus criticus

Text of from autopsy; Romano: S. ARRVNTI; Mommsen, Bivona: . Arrunti[o---]
2: Romano: BRO.CL; Mommsen, Bivona: Brocc[ho---]
3: Romano: OCVS.PV LIC D; Mommsen, Bivona: [l]ocus pu[b]lic(e) d[atus]

English translation

To Marcus Arruntius Brocch[us]. (This) burial plot was granted, at public expense, by the decree of the town council. In width [...] feet, in depth 20(+?) feet.

commentary

There is a clear vacat after the surviving text.

bibliography

  • Romano 1829 294 no.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002748
  • Romano 1838 88 no.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001618

  • 52 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002137
